text.tspan: This animation has an anti-war theme in its core. It basically shows a life circle of but
terflies and tries to view human’s endless and meaningless wars from butterflies’ per
The narrative is simple. It fellows the life journey of butterflies and shows different
scenes among this journey as a glimpse to show what’s happening in the human world.
The sound and all stuffs scattering around serve as cues for audience to guess what’s
happening, and leave much of space for them to interpret those scenes.
Colors used in this work are only red, white and black, which gives the picture a concise
and clear look. There is only two shots in the video, and an effect of camera movement
was achieved by manipulating motions of different objects. The background sounds are
made of varies of different sound effect pieces found on the FreeSound and cut togeth
-Clips are presented during NYU SH’s 2018 Graduation Ceremony-
